subject: Olympic Games (2006)
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Skier Bode Miller, whose performance at the Turin Olympics was a letdown, was among those soaking up the emotion at the U.S. Open when Andre Agassi played his final match.
snippet: Skier Bode Miller, whose performance at the Turin Olympics was a letdown, was among those soaking up the emotion at the U.S. Open when Andre Agassi played his final match.
